Texts.Eng:
Being mutated hybrid of human and a pony, while they do behave like former, they do take part in some equine activities such as eating hay and watching My Little Human: Warfare is Magic.

Diet: ^green;Herbivore^reset;

^orange;Perks^reset;: 

Energy x^green;1.1^reset; Regen
+^green;5^reset;% Speed
Resist: ^green;15^reset;% Radiation, Poison
Immune: Rad Burn and Radiation.
 
^orange;Environment^reset;: 
 
On Radioactive-type biomes gain ^green;15^reset;% Energy and ^green;25^reset;% Energy Regen, but lose ^red;5^reset;% Armor Protection and ^red;5^reset;% Damage.
 
^orange;Weapons^reset;: 

Yo-Yo: +^green;15^reset;% Speed
Swords: Damage x^green;1.125^reset;, +^green;2.5^reset;% Crit Chance

^red;Weaknesses^reset;: 

Resist: ^red;20^reset;% Shadow, Cosmic, ^red;100^reset;% Fire
-^red;15^reset;% Armor Protection
